text: يمريم اقنتى لربك واسجدى واركعى مع الركعين

translations.translation: And when the angels said, 'Maryam, Allah has chosen you and purified you. He has chosen you over all other women.
So adore your Lord, O Mary, and pay homage and bow with those who bow in prayer."
O Mary! Remain devout to your Lord, and prostrate yourself in worship, and bow with those who bow (before Him).'
Mary, pray devotedly to your Lord, prostrate yourself before Him and bow down with those who bow down before Him."
“O Maryam! Stand in reverence before your Lord, prostrate yourself and bow along with those who bow.”
O Maryam! Submit yourself with obedience (Aqnuti) to your Lord and prostrate yourself, and bow down along with Ar-Raki`in."
O Marium! keep to obedience to your Lord and humble yourself, and bow down with those who bow.
Mary; be obedient to thy Lord, prostrating and bowing before Him.'
O Mary! Be obedient to thy Lord, prostrate thyself and bow with those who bow (in worship).
O Mary! Remain truly devout to your Sustainer, and prostrate yourself in worship, and bow down with those who bow down [before Him]."
Maryam! be devout unto thy Lord, prostrate thyself, and bow down with them that bow down.
O Mary, be obedient to your Lord and prostrate and bow down with those who bow [in worship].’
O Mary! worship Thy Lord devoutly: Prostrate thyself, and bow down (in prayer) with those who bow down."
O Mary! "Submit yourself with obedience to your Lord (Allah, by worshipping none but Him Alone) and prostrate yourself, and Irka'i (bow down etc.) along with Ar-Raki'un (those who bow down etc.)."
Mary, be obedient to your Lord, prostrate and bow with those who bow'
“O Mary, be devoted to your Lord, and bow down, and kneel with those who kneel.”
O Mary, be devoutly obedient to your Lord and prostrate and bow with those who bow [in prayer]."
[3:43] O Mary, be obedient to your Lord, be compliant before Him, prostrating and bowing with those who bow’, that is, pray with those who pray.

(0 Mary! Be obedient to thy Lord) as a token of gratitude to Him; it is also said this means: prolong your prayer as a token of gratitude to your Lord, (prostrate thyself and bow) meaning: and do also prostrate and bow (with those who bow (in worship)) with the people of worship.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
لأداء شيء من حقه { وَٱرْكَعِي } دائماً
 لخدمة بيته وتطهيراً من الأوساخ والأدناس { مَعَ ٱلرَّاكِعِينَ } [آل عمران: 43] المحريين المنحنين قامتهم دائماً على خدمة الله وخدمة بيته

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
أو ليقترن { اركعي } بالراكعين
 للإيذان بأنَّ من ليس في صلاتهم ركوعٌ ليسوا بمصلين
 وقيل: المراد بالقنوت: إدامة الطاعة
 كقوله:
[الزمر: 9]
 وبالسجود
 الصلاة
 لقوله: { وإدبار السجود } 
 وبالركوع: الخشوع والإخبات
 قاله البيضاوي
 وقال الأوزاعي: لما قالت لها الملائكة ذلك
 قامت في الصلاة حتى تورمت قدمها وسالت دماً وقَيْحاً
 الإشارة: لا يصطفي الله العبدَ لحضرته إلا بعد تطهيره من الرذائل
 وتحليته بأنواع الفضائل
 وقطعه عن قلبه الشواغل
 والقيام بوظائف العبودية
 وبالآداب مع عظمة الربوبية
 والخضوم تحت مجاري الأقدار
 والتسليم لأحكام الواحد القهار
 فأنفاس المريد ثلاثة: عبادة
 ثم عبودية
 ثم عبودة
 ثم يترقى إلى مطالعة علم الغيوب
